name: Formal requirements
text: §490:5-104  Formal requirements.  A letter of credit, confirmation, advice, transfer, amendment, or cancellation may be issued in any form that is a record and is authenticated (i) by a signature, or (ii) in accordance with the agreement of the parties or the standard practice referred to in section 490:5-108(e). [L 1996, c 39, pt of §1]
